case_studies.title: UK Biotech FP&A Planning Rescue

challenge.summary: Failed planning implementation with zero user adoption. Finance team reverted to fragmented, manual planning across spreadsheets, Google Sheets, Airtable, NetSuite, and HRIS systems.
pain_points: Data scattered across multiple sources with different aggregation levels
Drug discovery projects constantly changing in spreadsheets

solution.approach: Built comprehensive planning solution from scratch with automated integrations.
components: Drug Discovery Project Planning Model - Hierarchical structure
Department Planning by Organizational Units
Workforce Planning Model - Active vs open roles
Automated Data Integration - NetSuite, HRIS, Airtable
Comprehensive Security Model
Run Bundle audit package for every automated data flow

conversation_hooks: Do you also have data scattered across multiple systems?
How long does your current planning cycle take?
Have you had failed implementations before?

case_studies.title: Invoice Automation for Global Media Company

challenge.summary: Manual invoice consolidation taking 1 week per quarter with 300-500 invoices.
pain_points: Invoices from multiple production companies in different formats

solution.approach: Python-based automation handling entire invoice consolidation and formatting process.
components: Automated invoice ingestion from multiple sources
Data validation and error detection
Standardized formatting and consolidation
Run Bundle output with full audit trail

case_studies.title: AI-Powered Data Assistant for Executives

challenge.summary: Executives waiting hours or days for data requests. Finance team bottleneck on ad-hoc reporting.
pain_points: Every data request required analyst intervention

solution.approach: AI-powered data assistant allowing executives to ask questions in natural language.
components: Natural language interface for data queries
Connected to multiple backend data sources
Real-time answers with source attribution

secondary_metrics: Finance team freed from ad-hoc requests

case_studies.title: Professional Services Month-End Close Acceleration

challenge.summary: Month-end close taking 12 business days with manual journal entries and spreadsheet reconciliations.
pain_points: 12 business days to complete month-end close
Controller and team working weekends regularly

solution.approach: Automated close workflow with standardized processes and real-time visibility.
components: Automated journal entry templates with validation rules
Cross-system reconciliation engine
Close progress dashboard with task tracking
Exception-based review workflow
Run Bundle audit package for every close cycle

results.primary_metric: 75% reduction in close time (12 days → 3 days)

conversation_hooks: How many business days does your month-end close currently take?
Does your team have to work weekends during close?
How much time do you spend on reconciliations each month?

case_studies.title: Pharma Regulatory Reporting Automation

challenge.summary: Monthly regulatory reports for multiple jurisdictions requiring 3-4 days of manual preparation with no audit trail.
pain_points: 5 different regulatory report formats required monthly
3-4 days spent on manual data extraction and validation
No audit trail showing when data was pulled or transformed

solution.approach: Automated regulatory reporting pipeline with complete audit trail at every step.
components: Automated data extraction from ERP and subledgers
Validation rules engine
Multi-format output generator
Submission-ready packages with documentation
Run Bundle with complete traceability

results.primary_metric: 80% reduction in report preparation time (4 days → 8 hours)

conversation_hooks: How much time does your team spend on regulatory report preparation?
When auditors ask for documentation, how long does it take to produce?
Do you ever worry about missing a submission deadline?
